name: VOYAGER (itch) (VoyagerGame)
description:
Take a relaxing minute to explore the cosmos in Voyager. Explore little solar systems & create gorgeous emergent celestial art.

Please also feel free to leave your feedback in the comments section! we are still growing & developing the game & your opinion is very much valued by us!

Follow us on Twitter : https://twitter.com/VoyagerPlay

Watch some relaxing space videos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCS1M4QYOLtO08ltJ_gkYRsQ/featured

And if you manage to capture any nice screenshots, put them up on our Reddit! https://www.reddit.com/r/VoyagerExperience/
